title: Engineering Application Developer
summary: Early career building 3D-to-2D transformation tooling for shipbuilding drawings, deployments, logging, and a scripting IDE for engineers.
description: Wrote 3D-to-2D code transformations for shipbuilding engineering drawings on the LPD-17 project.
Managed deployment of networked applications used by engineering teams.
Developed error reporting/logging databases and front-ends to monitor transformation runs.
Built an IDE to script and automate the transforms so engineers could iterate without rewriting code.
Collaborated with engineers to translate CAD/geometry requirements into reliable transformation routines.
